title: Turbine Power Curve
description: Define a wind turbine power curve.

label.title: Power curve label
label.description: An optional slugified string key used to reference this power curve, eg siemens-swt-whatever. This is best used as an identifier within a database or graph (in the same way that mode labels are used to reference a given mode within the power curve - see the 'modes' property)

message.pattern: Correct format of the label is kebab-case (lowercase, numeric digits and hyphens only)

document_version.title: Document version
document_version.description: Manufacturer's document reference (from which raw power curves data is taken)

message.required: Document version is a required property

manufacturer_name.title: Manufacturer name
manufacturer_name.description: Full name of the manufacturer (eg a legal entity)

manufacturer_display_name.title: Manufacturer display name
manufacturer_display_name.description: Shortened or informal name of the manufacturer (for display purposes, eg in dropdown selectors). See also manufacturer_name.

model_name.title: Model name
model_name.description: Name of the turbine model (according to the manufacturer)

model_description.title: Model description
model_description.description: General description about the turbine model, eg for giving a brief overview in a turbine selection tool.
examples: An example simple turbine with only one mode.

platform_name.title: Platform name
platform_name.description: Optional name of the platform on which this turbine model is based.

platform_description.title: Platform description
platform_description.description: Optional general description of the platform on which this turbine model is based.
examples: The 1.x Series platform was designed as a basis for a range of small-scale onshore turbines versatile for a range of site conditions.

rated_power.title: Rated power [W]
rated_power.description: Nominal rated power of the turbine in W. Used for preliminary sizing and search. This value may be overridden on a per-mode basis.

rotor_diameter.title: Rotor diameter [m]
rotor_diameter.description: Nominal rotor diameter of the turbine [m]

available_hub_heights.title: Available hub heights
available_hub_heights.description: Specify either a discrete list or a continuous range of available/recommended hub heights

anyOf.description: Specify a range of available/recommended hub heights
1D array [1 x H] containing available/recommended hub heights [m].

drive_type.title: Drive type
drive_type.description: The drive type of the turbine

regulation_type.title: Regulation type
regulation_type.description: The regulation type of the turbine.

design_basis.title: Design basis
design_basis.description: Information about the design point (environmental conditions) the power curves in this document are certified for.

iec_class.title: IEC class
iec_class.description: The IEC class rules under which the turbine was designed and certified

average_wind_speed.title: Average wind speed [m/s]
average_wind_speed.description: The V_ave 10-minute average wind speed for which the turbine is certified in m/s

extreme_wind_speed.title: Extreme wind speed [m/s]
extreme_wind_speed.description: The V50 10-minute extreme wind speed for which the turbine is certified in m/s

survival_wind_speed.title: Survival wind speed [m/s]
survival_wind_speed.description: The Ve50 3s gust wind speed for which the turbine is certified m/s

turbulent_intensity_v50.title: Turbulent Intensity [%]
turbulent_intensity_v50.description: The V50 design value of turbulent intensity I

turbulent_intensity_iec61400_ref.title: Turbulent Intensity [%]
turbulent_intensity_iec61400_ref.description: The reference value of turbulent intensity I, according to IEC61400-1

turbulent_intensity_iec61400_wft.title: Turbulent Intensity [%]
turbulent_intensity_iec61400_wft.description: The V90 extreme value of turbulent intensity I, according to IEC61400-1, including wind farm turbulence @15m/s

weibull_shape_factor_k.title: Weibull Shape Factor, k
weibull_shape_factor_k.description: The Weibull distribution shape factor k

grid_voltage.title: Grid voltage [V]
grid_voltage.description: The design grid voltage in V

grid_frequencies.title: Grid frequencies [Hz]
grid_frequencies.description: The allowable design grid frequencies in Hz

operational_temperature.title: Operational temperature
operational_temperature.description: The allowable range of operational temperature in degree celcius

default_mode.title: Default mode
default_mode.description: The label of the mode that should be used by default (must match an entry in 'modes')

modes.title: Modes
modes.description: Different modes that the turbine can operate in / switch between

label.title: Mode label
label.description: A string key identifying the mode, e.g. `PO1 power-optimised`

description.title: Mode description
description.description: Short human readable text which will be rendered into dropdowns and made searchable.

rated_power.title: Mode rated power (W)
rated_power.description: Rated power of the turbine in this mode [W]

cut_in.title: Cut in
cut_in.description: A description of the cut in characteristics (a discontinuity in the power curve at low speeds)

kind.title: Cut in characteristic
kind.description: Select the kind of cut in characteristic to apply

recut_out_speed.title: Re-cut out speed [m/s]
recut_out_speed.description: As wind speed decreases back to zero, this is the speed at which the turbine will cut out. Should be less than the cut in speed.

cut_out.title: Cut out
cut_out.description: A description of the cut out characteristics (a discontinuity in the power curve at high wind speeds)

kind.title: Cut out characteristic
kind.description: Select the kind of cut out characteristic to apply

cut_out_speed.title: Cut out speed [m/s]
cut_out_speed.description: Wind speed above which the turbine is cut out, and below which it cuts back in

start_speed.title: Cut out ramp start speed [m/s]
start_speed.description: Wind speed above which the power starts to ramp down

end_speed.title: Cut out ramp end speed [m/s]
end_speed.description: Wind speed above which the cut out ramp is complete

cut_out_speed.title: Cut out speed [m/s]
cut_out_speed.description: Wind speed above which the turbine is cut out

recut_out_speed.title: Re-cut in speed [m/s]
recut_out_speed.description: As wind speed decreases back toward zero, this is the speed at which the turbine will cut back in. Should be less than the cut out speed.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Independent parameters for which the power curve is described

label.title: Parameter label
label.description: A slugified string key used to identify the parameter (e.g. air-density)

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: Dimension of the power curve array along which this parameter varies (0-based)

points.title: Points
points.description: Sampling points of this parameter corresponding to points on the power curve

cp_is_coefficient.title: Cp is Coefficient
cp_is_coefficient.description: True if the `cp` array is in nondimensional coefficient form, False if the `cp` array contains Power [W].

ct_is_coefficient.title: Ct is Coefficient
ct_is_coefficient.description: True if the `ct` array is in nondimensional coefficient form, False if the `ct` array contains Thrust [kgms^-2].

cp.title: Power Curve [cp]
cp.description: The coefficient of power, defined as an N-D array at the sample points described in 'Parameters'

oneOf.title: 2 Parameters (2D Array, e.g. air-density and wind-speed)
3 Parameters (3D Array, e.g. turbulent-intensity, air-density and wind-speed)
4 Parameters (4D Array, e.g. monin-obukhov-stability, turbulent-intensity, air-density and wind-speed)

ct.title: Thrust Curve [ct]
ct.description: The coefficient of thrust, defined as an N-D array at the sample points described in 'Parameters'

oneOf.title: 2 Parameters (2D Array, e.g. air-density and wind-speed)
3 Parameters (3D Array, e.g. turbulent-intensity, air-density and wind-speed)
4 Parameters (4D Array, e.g. monin-obukhov-stability, turbulent-intensity, air-density and wind-speed)
